entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry had entered himself for the tournament.

entities.name: gryffindors
entities.description: Unlike the Gryffindors, they did not seem impressed.

entities.name: hufflepuffs
entities.description: The Hufflepuffs had turned remarkably cold toward the whole lot of them.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric was one of the few who had ever given them any glory, having beaten Gryffindor once at Quidditch.

entities.name: ernie macmillan
entities.description: Ernie Macmillan and Justin Finch-Fletchley did not talk to Harry even though they were repotting Bouncing Bulbs at the same tray.

entities.name: justin finch-fletchley
entities.description: Ernie Macmillan and Justin Finch-Fletchley did not talk to Harry even though they were repotting Bouncing Bulbs at the same tray.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron wasn’t talking to Harry either.
